column1: @entity0 is a cat. He has a sister called @entity2. @entity0 and @entity2 like to play outside. They chase bugs in the backyard. When they get tired, they sleep in the sun. They do not like to go outside when it is raining. On rainy days @entity0 and @entity2 sit in the window. They watch the rain through the window. @entity0 is big and has grey and white fur. His nose is pink. @entity2 is small and has grey fur. Her nose is the same color as her fur. @entity2 is round. @entity0 is tall. @entity0 likes to eat. He worries when there is no food in his bowl. @entity2 likes to roll in dirt. Sometimes she is smelly.  At @entity1 time they like to play with the @entity1 tree and presents. @entity0 climbs the @entity1 tree and breaks ornaments. @entity2 plays with the presents and unwraps them with her claws.
@placeholder do @entity0 and @entity2 watch the rain through the window
